title: FS: N172 Old Judge and a few N28

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judge and a few N28
posts.post_content:
Hello: I have several Old Judge and a few N28 and N29 available for sale. Follow the link below for front/back scans. I will consider trades for Louisville OJ's + Colgan Chips I do not have or HOF from any issue. For payment I will accept Paypal gift, checks or money orders. I will ship for free with insurance. 

Please forward all questions to [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks, Chris :)

Link to scans
[url]http://imageevent.com/gimble200/oldjudges?n=0&z=2&c=4&x=0&m=60&w=0&p=0[/url]
